channel.title: How to make my server public?
channel.description:
Okay well i did no-ip, i did portforwarding, and all that but i do not know how to allow others to join or download my game so i was wondering if anyone knew how to let others join my game with portforwarding
if you can help much appreciated :)

item.title: How to make my server public?
item.dc:creator: @j19283746 j19283746
item.description:
@j19283746 wrote:

I HIGHLY suggest coding your client the way you want it before you release. I made a bad mistake and released without even changing the Login Page. Then it’s a hassle to code the client and re-upload and get people to redownload the client all over again. PLEASE take this advice.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make my server public?

item.title: How to make my server public?
item.dc:creator: @iamapker iamapker
item.description:
@iamapker wrote:

yeah bro look for either EGUI.java or GUI.java then when you find one or both open them and hit ctrl+f then search for

Serverip =

and after the = put whatevre your server ip is for example lalaland.no-ip.info or something so at the end that line would look like this

Serverip = “lalaland.no-ip.info”;

Read full topic

item.source: How to make my server public?

item.title: How to make my server public?
item.dc:creator: @bluescapepkz bluescapepkz
item.description:
@bluescapepkz wrote:

Go into your client and find client.java. type ctrl+f and search setip OR setserver. change the ip next to it to your no-ip adress.
It should look like

setserver("127.0.0.1", "43594");

change 127.0.0.1 [or whatever yours says] to your no-ip adress.
Then compile. Your server’s ip is changed.
Next, go to an upload site. I use mediafire.com. You don’t need an account to upload. zip your client and upload it. Next go to the upload link and copy it. That’s your client download link for people to download.
Then run your server. It should be online and people should be able to log in. for you to login, your ip on client should be 127.0.0.1

Read full topic
item.source: How to make my server public?
